summary: Implements a disease model for child stunting, calculating monthly transition probabilities for onset, progression to severe stunting, and natural recovery in children under five. Integrates with the simulation framework to trigger complementary feeding interventions during routine health appointments and records annual prevalence statistics.
business_intent: Enable policymakers and health planners to assess the burden of stunting and evaluate the effectiveness of nutrition interventions such as complementary feeding programs within a population health simulation.
